MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich affecting properties in High Street and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of third party damage to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by  5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on the 8th April 2021.
